feed.title: Google Cloud: Cloud Healthcare API
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Cloud Healthcare API

entry.content:
• The Cloud Healthcare API now supports transcoding DICOM data with the following transfer syntaxes:
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.1.99 (Deflated Explicit VR Little Endian)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.51 (JPEG Extended)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.80 (JPEG-LS Lossless)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.81 (JPEG-LS Near-Lossless)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.110 (JPEG XL Lossless)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.111 (JPEG XL JPEG Recompression)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.112 (JPEG XL)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.201 (HTJ2K Lossless Only)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.202 (HTJ2K Lossless Only with RPCL Options)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.4.203 (HTJ2K)
  • 1.2.840.10008.1.2.8.1 (Deflated Image Frame Compression)
entry.summary: The Cloud Healthcare API now supports transcoding DICOM data using a wider range of transfer syntaxes. This includes various JPEG and HTJ2K compressions, enhancing flexibility for medical imaging data. The API also supports deflated transfer syntaxes for improved efficiency.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Transcoding Support Expanded

entry.content:
• DICOM exports to BigQuery now support a new JSON schema option
  • DICOM streaming to BigQuery now supports a new JSON schema option
  • The new JSON schema option contains fewer columns and works more gracefully with the 33,000 public tags defined in the DICOM standard. For more information on the new schema, see the BigQueryDestination field.
entry.summary: DICOM exports and streaming to BigQuery now support a new JSON schema. This schema has fewer columns and handles DICOM's 33,000 public tags more effectively.
entry.title: Feature: New JSON schema for DICOM exports and streaming

entry.content:
• DICOM streaming to BigQuery using the new JSON schema now supports Change Data Capture
  • For more information on enabling change data capture, see the BigQueryDestination field.
entry.summary: The DICOM streaming to BigQuery feature now supports Change Data Capture, allowing for more robust data management and analysis.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM streaming to BigQuery now supports Change Data Capture

entry.content: VersionedStorageSizeBytes was added to the output of GetFhirStoreMetrics.
entry.summary: A new metric, VersionedStorageSizeBytes, has been added to the output of GetFhirStoreMetrics.
entry.title: Feature: New Metric Available

entry.content: • The Cloud Healthcare API is now available in the me-central1 (Qatar) and me-central2 (KSA) regions.
entry.summary: The Cloud Healthcare API has expanded its reach and is now available in the me-central1 (Qatar) and me-central2 (KSA) regions.
entry.title: Feature: Cloud Healthcare API Now Available in New Regions

entry.content:
• A new application has been added to the Cloud Console under "Healthcare", called "DICOM Studio"
  • This new application provides a web interface for exploring DICOM Stores in the Cloud Healthcare API similar to "FHIR Viewer".
  • Search and find studies, series, and instances in any DICOM Store using our DICOM Web API
  • View studies, series and instance metadata
  • Edit studies, series and instance metadata
  • Perform CRUD operations (Delete) on studies, series and instances
  • View studies, series and instance images via a transcoded image preview
entry.summary: Explore and manage your DICOM data with DICOM Studio, a new web interface in the Cloud Console. Search, view, edit, and delete studies, series, and instances, and preview images.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Studio Now Available

entry.content:
• A new application has been added to the Cloud Console under "Healthcare", called "DICOM Studio"
  • This new application provides a web interface for exploring DICOM Stores in the Cloud Healthcare API similar to "FHIR Viewer".
  • Search and find studies, series, and instances in any DICOM Store using our DICOM Web API
  • View studies, series and instance metadata
  • Edit studies, series and instance metadata
  • Perform CRUD operations (Delete) on studies, series and instances
  • View studies, series and instance images via a transcoded image preview
entry.summary: Explore and manage your DICOM data with ease using DICOM Studio, a new web interface in the Cloud Console's Healthcare section. Similar to FHIR Viewer, it allows you to search, view, edit, and delete studies, series, and instances, and even preview images.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Studio Now Available

entry.content:
• Accept-Encoding compression headers on DICOM frame requests that contain uncompressed pixel data (as defined by the DICOM transfer syntax) are now supported and can return compressed results

Note: For very large downlinks and very large files where downlink vastly outpaces compression speed, latency may slightly increase. Compression can be disabled by not including the header in these cases.
entry.summary: `Accept-Encoding` headers are now supported for DICOM frame requests with uncompressed pixel data, allowing for compressed results.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Compression Support

entry.content: Preview: Cloud Healthcare API has launched DICOM Updates and Patches. This allows customers to update their DICOM data in-place. For more information, see Update and patch DICOM studies, series, and instances.
entry.summary: The Cloud Healthcare API now supports updating DICOM data in-place, simplifying data management.
entry.title: Feature: DICOM Updates and Patches Now Available

entry.content: The Healthcare Natural Language API is deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, see Deprecations.
entry.summary: The Healthcare Natural Language API is being deprecated and will be shut down on May 27, 2026. For more information, please refer to the deprecations page.
entry.title: Deprecated: Healthcare Natural Language API Deprecation
